text: sing thi phwk than khea rph xi ba dah xun cak phraxngkh michı xun dı nxkcak brrda chux thi phwk than læa brrda brrphburusʹ khxng phwk than chı reiyk man xallxh midi prathan hlakthan nı reuxng ni lng ma kar tadsin midi pen siththi khxng khır nxk ca kxallxh phraxngkh thrng chı mi hı phwk than khea rph xi ba dah sing dı nxkcak phraxngkh theanan nan khux sasna thi theiyngthrrm tæ swn hıy khxng mnusʹy miru
